isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - (EDL) ENGINE DATA LINE WITH ALLISON AT/MT TRANSMISSION - ECM DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: ECM DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: The ECM does not continuously monitor the EDL circuits. To check these circuits use the Prolink EST to perform the KOEO - Output Circuit Checks (OCC).

The OCC Test checks the Relay Control Coil circuits 97F, 92D, 92E and the relay control coil for opens or shorts (high or low). If a defect is noted, Flash Code 244 will be set. The Engine Warning light does not turn ON.

Note that the ECM DIAGNOSTICS DO NOT check the actual operation of the Modulator Shift Solenoid Control relay or the Modulator Shift Solenoid. The ECM DIAGNOSTICS also do not check circuits 92B, 92C or 92-G. For these reasons, it is possible for the Allison AT/MT transmission Modulator Shift Solenoid not to function, without a fault code.
